name: The Ninth
description: The Ninth is a strongly on-chain PlayFi Metaverse powered by the StarkNet. Land is the most important and limited digital asset in The Ninth. The LAND acts as a hub that connects different game players who are interacting and earning in our Metaverse.
short_description: Truly fun, secure and crypto-native games powered by StarkNet

links.website: <URL of the dapp's website. Leave empty if non-existent>
links.careers: <URL of the dapp's carreer page. Can also be 'mailto:example@mydapp.com'. Leave empty if non-existent>
links.twitter: <URL of the dapp's Twitter account>. Leave empty if non-existent
links.telegram: <URL of the dapp's Telegram>. Leave empty if non-existent
links.discord: <URL of the dapp's Discord invite>. Leave empty if non-existent
links.github: <URL of the dapp's Github>. Leave empty if non-existent
links.youtube: <URL of the dapp's Youtube channel>. Leave empty if non-existent
links.medium: <URL of the dapp's Medium>. Leave empty if non-existent
links.mirror: <URL of the dapp's Mirror page>. Leave empty if non-existent

twitterName: Twitter username. Leave empty if non-existent

teamInfo.founded: <Founding date of the project. FORMAT:  yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSz EXAMPLE: 2022-05-24T00:00:00.000Z >

tokens.address: <Address of any ERC-20 Mainnet tokens created by the dapp>

media.logoUrl: <URL for the logo of the dapp (hosted externally) Square. and at least 320 × 320 pixels>
media.bannerUrl: <URL for the banner of the dapp (hosted externally) Resolution: at least 1900 × 400 pixels>
media.previewUrl: <URL for a preview image of the dapp (hosted externally) Resolution: at least 700 × 400 pixels>
media.videoUrl: <URL for a video of the dapp (hosted externally)>

gallery.url: <URL for a promotional image or screenshots of the dapp (hosted externally) Resolution: at least 700 × 400. Add more entries to the 'gallery' array if necessary>
